info.name: YouTube 2017 - Fade watched videos
info.description:
Enhances the readability of your subscriptions by dimming (fading out) videos you have already watched.

Very simple little change, but helps a lot to distinct what to watch next. It's made for latest Youtube's Material Design layout. Enjoy.
info.additionalInfo: 28/06/2017 - Removed fades from the Related sidebar. 26/06/2017 - I've rewritten whole code to make it more global. If you don't like it, use Legacy version 17/06/2017 - Added support for light theme, with an option to revert it.
